item.description:
Walk at Mt Auburn Cemetary
WHEN: Sunday Sept 25th (Heather's birthday)

EVENT: Historical walking tour of Mount Auburn Cemetery. Come enjoy the beautiful and serene views with a chance to learn about some of the lives of prominent Bostonians from the past. Then we will go for some Coffee/tea and good conversation afterwards.

Trip'sCoordinator: Heather
MEET: 1pm. Meeting area will be given out when you RSVP  (rain cancels)
RSVP: Required by September 23rd, use the TC link above and include a cell phone number in your RSVP for contact on the 15th.  Heather can provide more details on the arrangements if you want when you RSVP.
 COST: $5 which can be credited towards a full membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements to meet

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Let's go on a Walk in Cambridge
